page.title: 09LIFE IN MILDENHALL
page.content: {Interviews with children who live {there produced this description of the {village of Mildenhall _ "Mildenhall is a very quiet village with no heavy traffic going through it as most cars bypass the village on the A4.The village has a post office and one general store but most people go into the nearby town of Marlborough to do their shopping.There are no schools in the village so children also go to Marlborough to school, but the village does have its own church.Most people from the village work locally, either in Marlborough or on the local farms, though some do commute to Swindon. There is a pub in the village called 'The Horseshoe'.Mildenhall does have a village hall which used to be the centre for village activities, but unfortunately it has been closed as it was judged to be unsafe.
